headline: Politically Georgia: Teflon Herschel Walker is frustrating his rivals
author: Patricia Murphy
sentences: In this edition of the Politically Georgia podcast, political insiders Greg Bluestein and Patricia Murphy dig into Perdues strategy and takes a look at why Walkers opponents are struggling to land attacks against a Teflon candidate.
Senate candidate Herschel Walker is ignoring his Republican rivals, while David Perdue is stepping up his appeals to the GOPs far right.
